description: Single location: only in one town, city, village, post code/zip
Only in one Sub-region: only in oneﾠadministrative division, district, state, or province
Multiple sub-regions: spread over multiple sub-regions, but not national in scope
National: scaled to the national level ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ
Multiple countries: taking place in more than one country
Regional: aimed at supporting regional capacity, regional institutions, regardless of where the activities are taking place
